comments:
When opening a hit (e.g. via link or search view) the following happens.  Make sure to add this step to the manual tests.  Replicate via following a link to a bug not in the Task List or opening it from the search view.

-- Error Log --

Looks like this was a bad interaction with Jeff's addition of the Attach Context button, which expected tasks to be non-null.  That's now fixed.  Rob: please do a sanity check via manual tests.

Jeff: note that the task editor may not have a task (e.g. in the case of a search hit).
